member.name: T:MotorD
member.summary: A set of quick methods for a motor connected to port D.

member.name: M:GetTacho
member.summary: Query the current rotation count of a single motor for port D. As long as the counter is not reset it will accurately measure all movements of a motor, even if the motor is driven by some external force while not actively running. Note that this command does not work for motors connected via daisy-chaining.
member.returns: The current rotation count in degrees for motor port B

member.name: M:GetSpeed
member.summary: Query the current speed of a single motor for port D. Note that this command does not work for motors connected via daisy-chaining.

member.name: M:ResetCount
member.summary: Set the rotation count of motor port D to 0.

member.name: M:SetDirectPolarity
member.summary: Sets the direct polarity for motor to port D

member.name: M:SetReversPolarity
member.summary: Sets the direct polarity for motor to port D

member.name: M:Off
member.summary: Stop motor port D. This will also cancel any scheduled movement for this motor. Motor will continue to rotate by inertia

member.name: M:OffAndBrake
member.summary: Stop motor port D. This will also cancel any scheduled movement for this motor. Motor will stop completely

member.name: M:IsLarge
member.summary: Set the motor type for port D - Large motor

member.name: M:IsMedium
member.summary: Set the motor type for port D - Medium motor

member.name: M:SetSpeed
member.summary: Set motor speed to port D.
member.param: Speed value from -100 (full reverse) to 100 (full forward)

member.name: M:SetPower
member.summary: Set motor power to port D.
member.param: Speed value from -100 (full reverse) to 100 (full forward)

member.name: M:StartSpeed
member.summary: Set motor speed to port D, then start motor.
member.param: Speed value from -100 (full reverse) to 100 (full forward)

member.name: M:StartPower
member.summary: Set motor power to port D, then start motor.
member.param: Speed value from -100 (full reverse) to 100 (full forward)
